message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  How about we settle at $18,000? This would be a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $15,000 would be a fair price for this product. Could we possibly meet closer to my initial offer?
